content.README.md:
# Welcome to your organization's demo respository
This code repository (or "repo") is designed to demonstrate the best GitHub has to offer with the least amount of noise.

The repo includes an `index.html` file (so it can render a web page), two GitHub Actions workflows, and a CSS stylesheet dependency.
content.index.html: Welcome to the website generated by my demo repository
content..github/workflows/auto-assign.yml:
name: Auto Assign
on:
  issues:
    types: [opened]
  pull_request:
    types: [opened]
jobs:
  run:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    permissions:
      issues: write
      pull-requests: write
    steps:
    - name: 'Auto-assign issue'
      uses: pozil/auto-assign-issue@v1
      with:
          repo-token: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
          assignees: Surfer12
          numOfAssignee: 1
content..github/workflows/proof-html.yml:
name: Proof HTML
on:
  push:
  workflow_dispatch:
jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - uses: anishathalye/proof-html@v1.1.0
        with:
          directory: ./

mistral_analysis.primary_purpose: Demonstration of GitHub features and basic web content

security_analysis.workflows: Standard GitHub Actions with appropriate permissions

recommendations: Add code quality checks to workflows
